reviewerName: Miss R. Noir "Writer, Musician, Veteran Burne...
reviewtext: Brand new condition. Fast shipping. this tablet is the best deal on a 9" size that you can get. Way better than what the same size cost in my last husband.Easy to use, lots of storage for apps even the large ones. PLUS will hold additional scancard. Beats the Kindle (sorry Amazon) by a mile in functionality, weight and price.
